Hello & Welcome.

I'm Tareq Anwar: a programmer, gamer, and blogger.

After completing B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering, I started my career as a web developer. Programming is my passion. I am always learning and trying to keep up with the help of the internet. I love FreeCodeCamp and other open-source community. Pursuing a Web Development diploma at the University of Winnipeg. Also, I have a plan to obtain all the certificates from Free Code Camp.

— Tareq
